divs: Sighting Detailswe drove on a little road between 2 small villages in Belgium when we saw in thesky a strange element coming towards us, after a moment the shape staied abovetrees and wait a few before going fast to the SE. It was a big rectangular shapelike a football field... with orange-yellow lights7C---------------7C7C7C7C-------------7C7C7C7C---------------7C
